fr.umlv.jphoto.cela.data
Class Slide

java.lang.Object
  fr.umlv.jphoto.cela.data.Slide
All Implemented Interfaces:
TransitionConfig
public class Slide
extends java.lang.Object
implements TransitionConfig

Slide is used to represent a slide for the SlideShowAdapterTableColumnModel This object implement TransitionConfig, the slide is gave to the constructor of Transtion.

Author:
Laurent Barbisan
